overview: A movie adaptation of Funayama  Kaoru's novel of the same name, which depicts the story of a modern youth who is attracted to the evil path.  Saburi Shin, a well-known actor who also demonstrated his skill as a director in a bold social work, embodies a person with a complicated dilemma in a shadowy manner, and is a dramatic work that plays a part in the lead role.
title: Akutoku
